Simulated data with some change (numerical)

Source: R/data.R
dbl_change.Rd

This data contained the numerical values for each observation.

Usage

dbl_change

Format

A data frame with 400 rows and 4 variables

id

The id of the organisation

time

time

gp

Either X or Y

values

Numerical values represent sales

Examples

d <- anim_prep(dbl_change, id = id, values = values,
time = time, group = gp)

d_p <- wallaby_plot(d, height = 1)
#> You can now use the animbook::anim_animate() function to
#>           transform it into an animated object

d_p_anim <- anim_animate(d_p)
#> You can now pass it to gganimate::animate().
#>                    The recommended setting is nframes = 89
